strapiPost.title: Railyard Park in Rogers Receives Statewide Recognition
strapiPost.content:
Railyard Park in Downtown Rogers was recognized as the Outdoor Facility of the Year in the over $500,000 category at the Arkansas Recreation and Parks Association Conference... much to the chagrin of Leslie Knope from Pawnee, IN. 

  • Back on track: Paying homage to Rogers’ rich history with the Frisco Railroad, Railyard Park has brought fresh life to Downtown Rogers, becoming a center for community life.
  • Fun for all: Whether it’s enjoying a concert, the farmers market, the splash pad, or hitting up any of the great restaurants nearby, there are ways for everyone to enjoy the Railyard Park in Downtown Rogers. 

Read about the Railyard Park HERE.
